name: Battle Shooting Hero-Gun Games
description:
Shoot fire at your opponents, kill them, then your firepower will become more stronger. Kill as many opponents as possible and become the last one to survive on the arena.

Game features:
- Simple and smooth shooter control
- Easy to play, hard to get win
- Many characters with different abilities and random scenes
- Two different game modes, survival mode and time-limited mode
Come on, begin your battle and become the last hero on the arena.
